item.title: About Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Posting after a while
item.description: I am going to make this post just to check out how the whole process of publishing from local Rmd file to github through the github integration and then ultimately netlify site gets updated.

item.title: Comparing GDP
item.description: First load the library library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.1.0 ✔ purrr 0.2.5 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.6 ## ✔ tidyr 0.

item.title: CSE index return analysis
item.description: let’s load the tidyquant package first library(tidyquant) let’s load the cleaned data first load("../RDATA/cse_clean.RData") Daily Return cse.clean.daily <- cse.clean %>% tq_transmute(select=index, mutate_fun=periodReturn, type="arithmetic", period="daily") %>% mutate(return.type=ifelse(daily.returns<0,"Loss","Not")) cse.clean.daily %>% count(return.type) %>% mutate(perc=n/sum(n)) # A tibble: 2 x 3 return.

item.title: Traffic congestion and Development Budget
item.description: Here I am going to compare the traffic congestion cost with the whole development budget of Government of Bangladesh (GOB) in FY 2017-18. This post was based on the information from news on Prothom-alo,25 March, 2018.

item.title: Prothom-alo Report on LFS in 2017
item.description: Based on the report let’s just crunch some numbers. emp <- c(47.4, 54.1,58.1, 59.5) years <- c(2005, 2010, 2013, 2015) emp.dat <- data.frame(year=years, employed=emp)

item.title: Introduction to Rilostat
item.description: Today in national daily prothom-alo I found an article titled “মানুষের কাজের সুযোগ কমেছে”. In that regard I thought I might have a look in the data of labor force.

item.title: Budget analysis - Ministry-wise expense
item.description: Today I am going to have a look at ministry wise expense from budget data of Ministry of Finance of Bangladesh. In the process, we will also see how to use tabulizer package to import data from PDF files.

item.title: UN vote on Jerusalem (Part 1)
item.description: my idea was to do a choloropeth mapping for the voting pattern of jerusalem voting first i will have to collect the names of the member countries following link finds any un voting results

item.title: Chaotic data on child marriage in Bangladesh (Part 1)
item.description: Today, one of the leading Bangla newspaper in Bangladesh Prothom Alo made a headline news which may read as “Child marriage has increased in Bangladesh”. The main point it is focusing on is, even though around the world child marriage is going down but in Bangladesh it is rising.

item.title: Chaotic data on child marriage in Bangladesh (Part 2)
item.description: Just following up from the earlier post, which was the first post of this series, I imported UNICEF data on child marriage. Now I will try to play around a bit with this data.

item.title: Getting myself started into text mining
Historic 7th March speech of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman in wordcloud
item.description: In one of my previous posts, I have ventured into creating a word cloud from some tutorial. Now since today is 7th March, the historic day when the founder of Bangladesh,Sheikh Mujibur Rahman , delivered a speech which greatly energized the nation before the Independence war broke out few days later.

item.title: Have fun with World Justice Project data
item.description: Today (March 2, 2018) I have seen the following the news on the Daily Star, the leading news paper in Bangladesh on Bangladesh being close to bottom in South Asia.

item.title: ggrepel Demo
item.description: ggrepel has come to the picture to solve the problem of overlapping text. I thing it is pretty useful. let’s first load the library library(tidyverse) ## Loading tidyverse: ggplot2 ## Loading tidyverse: tibble ## Loading tidyverse: tidyr ## Loading tidyverse: readr ## Loading tidyverse: purrr ## Loading tidyverse: dplyr ## Conflicts with tidy packages ---------------------------------------------- ## filter(): dplyr, stats ## lag(): dplyr, stats library(ggrepel) Let’s create the data first

item.title: ARI Data Analysis
item.description: Bangladesh government banned all types three wheelers in 22 national highways effective from last August 1, 2015. It was surely a drastic measure to curb the fatalities in road accidents that has taken epidemic proportion recently in Bangladesh.

item.title: Cuba and Castro's legacy
item.description: There have been lots of dicussion and debate on social media on the legacy of Fidel Castro since his death on November 25, 2016. Major focus was on Cuba’s exemplary achievement in health indicators during Castro’s regime.
